Hi Gordon,

[...]
> There may be more info in local-errors.log on the causing Exception -- this
> log output is accompanied by an exception stored to local-errors.

I just took a look: all of the exceptions fall into
java.net.SocketException, java.net.SocketTimeoutException, or
"org.apache.commons.httpclient.URIException: escaped query not
valid". Indeed, there are a lot of these URI exceptions.
